name: Lode
author: Tomas Buteler <tbuteler@me.com>
description: A universal GUI for test runners

scripts.build: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder && yarn run clean
scripts.build:all: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --m --l --w && yarn run clean
scripts.release: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --publish always && yarn run clean
scripts.release:mac: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --m --publish always && yarn run clean
scripts.release:linux: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --l --publish always && yarn run clean
scripts.release:win: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --w --publish always && yarn run clean
scripts.release:unix: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --m --l --publish always && yarn run clean
scripts.release:all: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses && node .electron-vue/build.js && electron-builder --m --l --w --publish always && yarn run clean
scripts.clean: rm -rf static/reporters && rm -rf dist/* && mkdir dist/electron && touch dist/electron/.gitkeep
scripts.clean:all: yarn run clean:build && yarn run clean
scripts.dev: yarn run icons && cross-env IS_DEV=true node .electron-vue/dev-runner.js
scripts.pack:reporters: yarn run pack:jest && yarn run pack:phpunit
